price: 73 Allah châtiera ainsi les hypocrites, hommes et femmes, et les idolâtres, hommes et femmes, et pardonnera aux croyants et aux croyantes. Allah est Très Clément et Très Miséricordieux.
arabic: لِّيُعَذِّبَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ وَٱلۡمُشۡرِكَٰتِ وَيَتُوبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَى ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَٰتِۗ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمَۢا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: liyuʿadhiba al-lahu al-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-mush'rikīna wal-mush'rikāti wayatūba al-lahu ʿalā al-mu'minīna wal-mu'mināti wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
